404

Hello!

We've had a bit of a redesign of the http4k documentation system. If you're here then it's possible that you've been sent here by a search engine before it's had the opportunity to reindex all of our content. To help you out (and because we haven't set up elaborate redirection rules), take a look at the URL you were trying to access and use the following guidance to select the correct entry from the navigation on the right:

  • /rationale content has moved to the Rationale
  • /cookbook/* content has moved to the How-To section
  • /module/* content has moved to the Module reference
